name: World of Solitaire - Classic, Spider, TriPeaks and more
name_original: World of Solitaire - Classic, Spider, TriPeaks and more
description:
"World of Solitaire - Free Card Game" is the best Solitaire card game on IOS!

If you like Windows Solitaire, you're going to love this app!

We've always strived to stay true to the classic Solitaire card game (also known as Klondike or Patience), the most popular version of Solitaire! A truly solitary experience! Try this completely custom version of Solitaire tailored for IOS devices, from the small screen all the way up to the large screen tablet. It has the best game play of any Solitaire in the market. Please take Solitaire for a spin and we think you'll see the difference. What have you got to lose, Solitare is a free download. Solitaire is also known as Patience.
FEATURES:
- Solitaire Draw 1 card
- Solitaire Draw 3 cards
- Portrait - Landscape - Right and left hand deal layouts
- Unlimited free solitaire games
- Undo feature
- Auto win solitaire hand
- Big and easy to see cards
- And so much more!
